personal.name: Ali Hariz Bin Anuari
personal.title: Software Engineering Student
personal.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & ML Engineer
personal.summary: I'm in my final year studying Software Engineering at UTM. During my 6-month internship at Malaysia Airports, I got to work on real systems that actual teams depend onâ€”like migrating a 10-year-old VB.NET app to Google Apps Script without breaking anything for Finance. That's when it clicked for me: good code isn't just about picking the right framework, it's about understanding what problem you're actually solving. I work with full-stack development and machine learning because they let me build things end-to-end. Whether it's using NLP to sort through thousands of complaints or setting up a finance tracker with live charts, I'm interested in stuff that actually ships and works when people use it.

reference.name: Prof Wan Mohd Nasir Wan Kadir
